thread.title: UP polls 2017: Akhilesh Yadav taunts PM Narendra Modi over his ‘hard work counts, not Harvard’ remark
thread.title_full: UP polls 2017: Akhilesh Yadav taunts PM Narendra Modi over his ‘hard work counts, not Harvard’ remark

author: FE Online
title: UP polls 2017: Akhilesh Yadav taunts PM Narendra Modi over his ‘hard work counts, not Harvard’ remark
text:
UP polls 2017: Akhilesh Yadav taunts PM Narendra Modi over his ‘hard work counts, not Harvard’ remark UP polls 2017: Akhilesh Yadav taunts PM Narendra Modi over his ‘hard work counts, not Harvard’ remark Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav in press meet today took a jibe at Narendra Modi's 'hard work' and 'Harvard' remark. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: March 3, 2017 8:56 PM Chief Minister of UP Akhilesh Yadav. (ANI) 
Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav in press meet today took a jibe at Narendra Modi ’s ‘hard work’ and ‘Harvard’ remark, in which Prime Minister had sought to criticise high profile economists and their penchant for downplaying or even blasting his government’s policies. He said, “PM ne Harvard (University) aur hard work ki baat ki, hum puchte hain, aapne hardly koi kaam kiya ho toh bata do. (PM Modi talked about Harvard and hardwork, I would like to ask him if he has hardly worked at all and if so he should mention it)” 
Further details awaited.
